summary: This is a brief email correspondence from August 10, 2019, forwarding a document titled 'Judge.Berman.Epstein.death.docx' for review. It appears to be internal communication regarding legal or procedural matters following Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Epstein Death Document
events.description: An email was sent requesting review and edits of a document concerning Judge Berman and Epstein's death.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 10, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 9-10, 2019.
It references a document titled 'Judge.Berman.Epstein.death.docx', indicating legal or judicial matters related to Epstein's death were being discussed.
The correspondence is a request for review and advice on potential edits to the attached document.
